title: New York - poverty rate 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Percentage of population has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Percentage of population, of value 16.0 was reached at Year 2011, and 2013
Minimum Percentage of population about 13.5 was reached at Year 2003
